nodes.excerpt: Malist – simple browser extension that takes your email book to a browser. Whenever you need somebody's email, simply click the button in the toolbar and get the email. No more need to ask for an email over and over again or to search in the contact book.
nodes.title: Malist - Your email book in a browser
nodes.author: Maksym  Potapenko

localize.description: Malist-简单的浏览器扩展，可将您的电子邮件书带到浏览器。当您需要某人的电子邮件时，只需单击工具栏中的按钮即可收到电子邮件。不再需要一遍又一遍地索要电子邮件，也不再需要在通讯录中搜索。
localize.tagline: 浏览器中的电子邮件薄

localize.description: Malist-簡單的瀏覽器擴展，可將您的電子郵件書帶到瀏覽器。當您需要某人的電子郵件時，只需單擊工具欄中的按鈕即可收到電子郵件。不再需要一遍又一遍地索要電子郵件，也不再需要在通訊錄中搜索。
localize.tagline: 瀏覽器中的電子郵件薄

nodes.excerpt: - Ref Career is a tool to maximise your chances of getting referred to an opening in any firm looking for candidates. - Get in touch with employees currently working with the firm willing to refer a potential candidate for the job opening.
nodes.title: refCareer - Online database for referrals
nodes.author: SARVESH DUBEY

localize.description: -推荐人职业生涯是一种工具，可以最大限度地增加你获得任何寻找候选人的公司空缺的机会。-联系目前在公司工作的员工，他们愿意推荐潜在的候选人来填补职位空缺。

nodes.excerpt: The Fuckin' Kill it Calendar is an evidence-based motivational cum productivity tool designed to force you to finish a task everyday. The Fuckin' Kill it Calendar is designed to break your procrastination habits by forcing you to complete one task everyday
nodes.title: Fuckin' Kill It Calendar 2021 edition - Calendar that helps you get shit done

localize.description: 该死的杀死它的日历是一个以证据为基础的激励和生产力工具，旨在迫使你每天完成一项任务。“他妈的杀了它日历”旨在通过强迫你每天完成一项任务来打破你的拖延症习惯

nodes.excerpt: Imagine all the money we could unlock by selling subscriptions that we bought but don't really use anymore. flipp is a platform to post your pre-owned subscriptions for sale. we already have 500+ users interested in buying pre-owned subscriptions at unloved.
nodes.title: flipp - Sell subscriptions you no longer need
nodes.author: Nitish Rathee

localize.description: 想象一下，我们可以通过出售我们购买但不再真正使用的订阅来解锁所有的钱。Flipp是一个发布二手订阅以供出售的平台。我们已经有500多名用户有兴趣在unLove购买二手订阅。
localize.tagline: 销售您不再需要的订阅

localize.description: 想象一下，我們可以通過出售我們購買但不再真正使用的訂閱來解鎖所有的錢。Flipp是一個發佈二手訂閱以供出售的平臺。我們已經有500多名用戶有興趣在unLove購買二手訂閱。
localize.tagline: 銷售您不再需要的訂閱

nodes.excerpt: Placement is Everyone's Talent Agent. We help people get jobs through modern technology plus human support. Fly through your job search at Placement.com.
nodes.title: Placement - Fly through your job search with magic tools & expert advice
nodes.author: Sean Linehan

localize.description: 安置是每个人的人才代理。我们通过现代技术和人力支持帮助人们找到工作。通过你在Placement.com上的求职，你可以在飞翔上找到工作。
localize.tagline: 飞翔用神奇的工具和专家的建议帮助您找工作

nodes.excerpt: Write concisely by substituting "very" + "adjective" with a more concise adjective that has the spirit of very contained within it.
nodes.title: Lose the Very - "Very good english" is not very good english. Lose the very.
nodes.author: Connor Callahan

localize.description: 用一个更简洁的形容词来代替“非常”+“形容词”，这样写起来就简洁了。
localize.tagline: “非常好的英语”不是很好的英语。失去最好的。

localize.description: 用一個更簡潔的形容詞來代替“非常”+“形容詞”，這樣寫起來就簡潔了。
localize.tagline: “非常好的英語”不是很好的英語。失去最好的。

nodes.excerpt: Snipp.in is a tiny in browser notes taking interface and snippet manager built for speed. Without any bs the app stores everything just inside your browser without even having you to sign up.
nodes.title: Snipp.in - Lightweight in-browser notes, snippet manager & code editor
nodes.author: Musthaq Ahamad

localize.description: in是一个微型的浏览器笔记记录界面和代码片断管理器，专为提高速度而构建。没有任何BS，这款应用程序甚至不需要你注册，就可以将所有内容存储在你的浏览器中。
localize.tagline: 轻量级浏览器内注释、代码段管理器和代码编辑器

localize.description: in是一個微型的瀏覽器筆記記錄界面和代碼片斷管理器，專爲提高速度而構建。沒有任何BS，這款應用程序甚至不需要你註冊，就可以將所有內容存儲在你的瀏覽器中。
localize.tagline: 輕量級瀏覽器內註釋、代碼段管理器和代碼編輯器

nodes.excerpt: Brainie uses music patterns to help your brain be more focused or relaxed. Designed for deep work to achieve flow or for relaxing sessions when you need to recharge. You can switch to different music patterns with different tempos to fit your needs.
nodes.title: Brainie - Music patterns to improve deep work, relaxation, and sleep.
nodes.author: Petr Selinger

localize.description: Brainie使用音乐模式来帮助你的大脑更专注或更放松。专为深度工作而设计，以达到流畅的效果，或在您需要充电时放松休息。您可以切换到不同的音乐模式和不同的节奏，以满足您的需要。
localize.tagline: 改善深度工作、放松和睡眠的音乐模式。

localize.description: Brainie使用音樂模式來幫助你的大腦更專注或更放鬆。專爲深度工作而設計，以達到流暢的效果，或在您需要充電時放鬆休息。您可以切換到不同的音樂模式和不同的節奏，以滿足您的需要。
localize.tagline: 改善深度工作、放鬆和睡眠的音樂模式。

nodes.excerpt: Reading and gaining knowledge shouldn't be a chore. Get one weekly Substack email digest from your favorite Substack writers.

nodes.excerpt: Imagine selling off all those annual subscriptions you don't use anymore and can't refund. We help you do exactly that. In a nutshell - unloved is a platform for buying and selling pre-owned tech subscriptions.

localize.description: 想象一下，卖掉所有你不再使用的年度订阅，而且不能退款。我们帮助您做到这一点。简而言之，无人喜爱是一个买卖二手科技订阅的平台。

localize.description: 下载各种可以通过电子邮件发送给朋友和家人的好东西。不要在商场里闲逛，滚动清单。呆在家里，把你的礼物通过电子邮件寄给你最喜欢的自助者、自助者和独立黑客，这样可以拯救生命。

nodes.excerpt: Postpace is a productivity platform for writers, bloggers, marketers and teams to automate their topic research workflow and rapidly build a content brief. Postpace helps study a topic by analyzing the top 15-20 organic results from Google for any keyword.
nodes.title: Postpace - Productivity platform for writers, bloggers & teams
nodes.author: Muntasir Rashid

localize.description: Postpace是一个生产力平台，供作家、博客作者、营销人员和团队自动化他们的主题研究工作流程，并快速构建内容摘要。Postpace通过分析来自Google的任意关键字的前15-20个有机结果来帮助研究主题。
localize.tagline: 面向作家、博客作者和团队的生产力平台

localize.description: Postpace是一個生產力平臺，供作家、博客作者、營銷人員和團隊自動化他們的主題研究工作流程，並快速構建內容摘要。Postpace通過分析來自Google的任意關鍵字的前15-20個有機結果來幫助研究主題。
localize.tagline: 面向作家、博客作者和團隊的生產力平臺

nodes.excerpt: Honk is the new way to chat with your friends in real-time, with messages shown live as you type! Fast, fun, private. Speak your mind and be yourself—it's a whole new way to chat.

nodes.excerpt: - Disk Space Fan is a super-fast + easy to use disk space analyzer - DSF's utilises Master File Table (MFT) tech to deliver the fastest disk scan speeds - Other features incl smart space usage visualizations + powerful tools to identify big/duplicate files
nodes.title: Disk Space Fan - Fast disk space analyzer with smart visualizations

nodes.excerpt: 1Question asks a quick study question before granting children access to their favorite apps...like sneaking vegetables into cake! Instead of complete restriction, 1Question creates unlimited opportunities for children to learn as they play.
nodes.title: 1Question - Turning your child's screen time into study time!
nodes.author: Ann Elnekave

localize.description: 在给孩子们访问他们最喜欢的应用程序之前，问题会问一个快速学习的问题……比如把蔬菜偷偷放到蛋糕里！1Query不是完全的限制，而是为孩子们创造了无限的机会，让他们在游戏中学习。
localize.tagline: 把孩子看电视的时间变成学习时间！

localize.tagline: 把孩子看電視的時間變成學習時間！

nodes.excerpt: PC Builder is a website which helps people build a list of compatible PC parts without getting into any compatibility issues. The website is created by keeping beginners in mind, and the main goal of this website is to make compatibility easy for everyone.

localize.tagline: 用于构建PC的自定义PC部件选取器工具

localize.description: PC Builder是一個網站，幫助人們創建兼容的PC部件列表，而不會遇到任何兼容性問題。這個網站是以初學者爲中心創建的，其主要目標是讓每個人都能輕鬆兼容。
localize.tagline: 用於構建PC的自定義PC部件選取器工具
